entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-02-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Requires Dynamic Code on a default constructor not respected when inherited. #112931
  • Proposal: expose 'IlcDehydrate' as a supported option #112927
  • [Wasm][net10] Building with `WasmBuildNative` and threading enabled fails with assertion #112926
    Future
  • `NamedPipeServerStream` recieves empty string from client #112912
  • AssemblyLoadContext.LoadFromAssemblyPath returns old Assembly #112911
  • .NET TP Worker: segfault on Linux #112910
  • Native image double mapping #112901
  • [API Proposal]: Add Parallel.InvokeAsync #112900
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 48 Regressions on 2/21/2025 4:40:21 PM +00:00 #112913
    10.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: MDArray2 Regression on 2/18/2025 9:18:32 PM +00:00 #112915
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: IPAddressPerformanceTests Regression on 2/17/2025 9:03:44 PM +00:00 #112916
  • Rfc2898DeriveBytes.Pbkdf2 holding threads #112898
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 6 Regressions on 2/20/2025 3:57:18 PM +00:00 #112914
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Perf_BigInteger Regressions on 2/20/2025 10:08:05 AM +00:00 #112919
    10.0.0
  • Signal SIGILL (Illegal instruction) code ILL_ILLOPN (Illegal operand) after migrate to .net9 #112897
  • Microsoft.Win32.SafeHandles.SafeFileHandle.CreateFile Access Denied After a While #112896
  • System.Memory 4.6.0 causes Azure Cloud Services (extended support) deployment failure #112887

Closed

  • JIT: Reconsider block weight propagation in loop cloning #103001
    10.0.0
  • JIT throughput: noway_assert #7709
    10.0.0
  • expose env variable to disable optimizations #94280
    10.0.0
  • Addressing mode was not contained #112692
    Future
  • LINQ.Expressions Power operator and BigInteger or Complex or custom #24708
  • Process crash when System.IO.Pipes.PipeCompletionSource.Cancel() throws ObjectDisposedExeption #39902
  • NativeAOT conflict resolution bug remains in v8.0.406 #112899
  • Incorrect key file location in linux rpm packages-microsoft-prod-1.0-1.noarch #111757
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'unreached' in 'TestHFAandHVA:ReturnVector2WrapperPromoted():TestHFAandHVA+Vector2Wrapper' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #112890
  • JIT: Wrong result with double comparison #112871
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Tests.Integration.DelayLoadingTests.PartTypeLoadedLazilyLazyLoopLoadsLazily #110130
    10.0.0
  • build release/9.0 android and ios local failed #110278
  • [outerloop] Assertion failed '(*use)->WasMorphed()' in R2R legs #112867
    10.0.0
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Test.EmitterTests.TestEmitter #112847
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorParserTests.MultipleTypeDefinitions #112837
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestEmitter #112838
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Tests.LoggerMessageGeneratorEmitterTests.TestBaseline_TestWithNestedClass_Success #112840
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Gen.OptionsValidation.Unit.Test.EmitterTests.InaccessibleValidationAttributesTest #112844
  • Test failure: ComInterfaceGenerator.Unit.Tests.ComInterfaceGeneratorOutputShape.EmptyComInterface #112843
  • Test failure: System.Data.Tests.DataSetTest2.ReadXmlSchema_Nested #112842
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.SourceGeneration.Configuration.Binder.Tests.ConfigurationBindingGeneratorTests.Collections #112845
  • Build nativeaot for arm failed #112903
  • SslStreamNetworkStreamTest failures "The remote certificate is invalid because of errors in the certificate chain: PartialChain" #112856
  • Help #112894
  • I suggest to add ReadOnlySequence constructor for ArraySegment #25729

PullRequests

Created

  • Add System.Net.ServerSentEvents to ASP.NET Core transport package #112930
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stackalloc localloc conditional2 #112928
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Add fallback for `notifyInstructionSetUsage` #112925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix JsonIgnore behavior on init-only properties in source generation mode #112924
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Implement void AsnWriter.Encode #112921
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Temporary hotfix for interpreter crash #112920
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Remove HoistedLocal from runtime-async spec #112918
    needs-area-label
  • [RISC-V] Eliminate unecessary add instruction in array indirection #112917
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] testing #112909
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Reapply "Use rangecheck in assertprop (#112766)" (#112872) #112907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable GC stress tests for the interpreter test #112906
    area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Cleanup some unused code and signature #112905
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [PERF] all build jobs used for performance testing are now possible to run inividually #112902
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix getting resource when ResourceResolve returns assembly with resource that is an assembly ref #112893
    Servicing-approved, area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, 9.0.4
  • Seed in the skeleton of ML-DSA based on current prototyping #112891
    area-System.Security, 10.0.0

Merged

  • Use FLS detach callback as a thread termination notification. Another try. #112809
    os-windows, area-VM-coreclr
  • [Android] Add callback to host-runtime contract for getting assembly data #112705
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Revert gen-buildsys.sh cmake command echo #112929
    needs-area-label
  • [release/10.0-preview2] Revert "version needed to extract" fix #112923
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO.Compression
  • Revert "version needed to extract" fix #112922
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Instructions for adding a native external library dependency #105045
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Fix small->uint->float casts with AVX-512 #112892
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Handle `FIELD_LIST` as a user of calls in lowering #112904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Disable PerfBDN tests. #112886
    area-Infrastructure, perf-pipeline
  • Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112789
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • Remove useless complementary assertions #110171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix missing morphed flag #112888
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] samplepoint instrumentation into Mono profiler #112352
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Fix doc typo #112875
    documentation, area-System.DirectoryServices, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Introduce O1K_VN #112889
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Use precise multireg arg check for old promotion #112883
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use certificate thumbprints from entire chain in SSL_CTX cache #112858
    area-System.Net.Security

Updated

  • Move UMEntryThunk to StubPrecode infrastructure #112460
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` #112864
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Delete old parameter ABI classification #112884
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Stackalloc localloc #112168
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [cDAC] Implement basic stackwalking #111759
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Support disassembling single file bundle for ILSpy #112541
    area-R2RDump-coreclr
  • Move local thread pool work items to global by default when blocking on a task #112796
    area-System.Threading, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Unblock Vector###<long> intrinsics on x86 #112728
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cached interface dispatch for coreclr #111771
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [DRAFT] Add ThisptrRetbufPrecode to set of precodes handled by StubPrecode path #112548
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [cDAC] DAC like entry point #112653
    enhancement, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [browser][st] event pipe #110818
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Set AppContext.BaseDirectory and the lookup path for AssemblyDirectory to the directory containing the NativeAOT module #112457
    breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] add and load empty ES6 module dotnet.diag.js when FeaturePerfTracing #112787
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • [8.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112790
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 8.0.x
  • [9.0] Make CPU utilization checks in the thread pool configurable #112791
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Threading, 9.0.x
  • Use osx.13.arm64.open queue for osx testing #112647
    needs-area-label
  • Fix `BigInteger.Rotate{Left,Right}` for backport #112878
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Remove a few unsafe bits in BCL #111643
    area-Meta
  • Fix the unsigned right shift operator of BigInteger #112879
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [Draft] callee type prop #112874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Compress SafeSocketHandle.Unix booleans #112417
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • Revamp the generation of runtime division checks on ARM64 #111543
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove `WasmFingerprintDotnetJs` tests and add `WriteImportMapToHtml` tests #112859
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Document NDK upgrade process #112885
    documentation, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Optimize bit-wise and operation and compare with same constant value #111933
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix `Monitor.Wait` unregistration in CoreCLR upon a thread exiting #112797
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] remove extra assert from WinHttp handler #112861
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net, 8.0.x
  • Consolidate guid definitions #112826
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make linux-riscv nativeaot port robust #112736
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, arch-riscv
  • [WinHTTP] Certificate caching on WinHttpHandler to eliminate extra call to Custom Certificate Validation #111791
    area-System.Net.Http, 10.0.0
  • Add benchmarks.run_pgo_optrepeat collection #112750
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Differentiate `MethodTable`s that are/aren't visible to reflection #112782
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix mono regressions in Number.Formatting.cs #112050
    area-System.Numerics
  • Arm-64:[PAC][WIP]Add auth-strip in prolog and epilog of jitted methods #110472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • arm64: Set zero flag for more comparisons #112863
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Simplify conditional operator #112074
    area-Meta, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix an edge case in the Tarjan GC bridge that leads to losing xref information #112825
    area-GC-mono, community-contribution
  • Modify buffer overflow logic for System.Buffers.ArrayPool.Tests.ArrayPoolUnitTests.ReturnBufferWhenFullFiresDroppedDiagnosticEvent #112849
    area-System.Buffers, community-contribution
  • [TESTING ONLY] Add another set of debugging prints for stack overflow issue #112284
    NO-MERGE, area-PAL-coreclr
  • [release/9.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112882
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix HttpHandlerDiagnosticListenerTests.TestW3CHeadersTraceStateAndCorrelationContext #112881
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.x
